publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. B[lower]] for G. Vincent and W. Blackwal and are to be sold at Guildhall gate,

notesStmt.note: Subsidiary title page reads: Strange fearful & true newes, which hapned at Carlstadt, in the kingdome of Croatia. .. Translated out of the Dutch coppie, printed at Vienna in Austria".
Printer's name from imprint on subsidiary title page.
Title page is a folded leaf; fold occurs through the "w" of "newes".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Preface dated 11 Feb. 1605 [o.s.]; year of publication confirmed by STC.
